item.title: A Bookmarklet to Replace Force(s) with Horse(s) based on xkcd 1418
item.description: This bookmarklet replaces the words force with horse and forces with horses to make sad news a bit more fun based on xkcd 1418.

item.title: Bookmarklet to make reading news more fun xkcd style
item.description: This bookmarklet replaces certain pieces of text on Web pages with other texts that supposedly make reading them more fun. Based on xkcd 1288.
